objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 5.8x5, 2 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 8 line(s) per column, 8-10 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Excavated 1905-1906? by Bernard Grenfell and Arthur Hunt, Egypt Exploration Society at Al Bahnasā, Miṣr from a garbage dump.
Moved 2001 to University of Oxford, Sackler Library at Oxford, England.

msIdentifier.msName: P. Oxy. 1782, University of Oxford, Sackler Library, Oxford, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Grenfell, Bernard P. and Arthur S. Hunt, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri, vol. 15, no. 1782, Egypt Exploration Society: London, England, 1922. OCLC 855777953.
